group_1.textCenter: Okay then, let's check today's schedule.
First, let's solve three problems students have.
And then, I would like to decide the layout for@our flyers.
Do we have any other high-priority task yet to be@finished...

group_1.textLeft: Huh...?!@Who, who's this...?

group_1.textRight: Now excuse me.

group_1.textLeft: ...You, I know you.

group_1.textRight: Of course, you should know me.
As I'm running for student council president like you.

group_1.textLeft: So, what do you want?

group_1.textRight: Will you withdraw your candidacy right now?
In the first place, you don't even have the rights to@run your campaign, you know?!
And yet, you've been making speeches and winning@support from students without any permission...
So just, cut it out with stirring up the election like@it's a game already!

group_1.textLeft: It's disappointing to hear that I'm playing around...
Y-Yuna...
Surely I don't have the rights to run my campaign.
However, I'm willing to overcome that problem.
I have the determination and will to become student@council president.
And there is no reason, my heart should be denied@by you.

group_1.textRight: You're, lying obviously!
You're a daughter of the mayor and you excel in your@academics, and also...
As a matter of fact, you could've got into a school@much better than here.
And yet, you came here!
With this, how can you say you're not playing here?!

group_1.textLeft: (Huh...@Was that so...?)

group_1.textRight: I'm...serious here...
Even in a school like this, I'll be eligible for the high@school recommendation admission if I become@student council president.
If that happens, even a not-so-smart girl like me@can go to a good university!
So don't get in my way anymore!!

group_1.textLeft: ...You are also the one who is getting in my way.

group_1.textRight: ...Excuse me...?

group_1.textLeft: No matter what you say, I will not give it up.

group_1.textRight: Yuna!!
Hey, what are you doing!@With the violence!

group_1.textLeft: ...Quiet, Kirari.
You do see she is serious right?
I understand the frustration because...
I am serious too.
And for that exact reason I will not give it up.
Surely, I entered this low-tier school opposing the@will of my parents.
But, I decided it for myself.
And I, have realized the problems this school has@after spending time here.
The fact that we have many troubled students,@which isn't only because of their own problems...
If we get to abolish the unreasonable rules binding@the students...
And get to make the rules by ourselves, more voluntarily...
Then that will change their behavior and will also@change the school. I am certain of it.
I have decided to fight this election for such a future.
Go ahead, hit me as many times as you'd like.
I will never give it up.

group_1.textRight: ...My bad, I'm just so angry and...

group_1.textLeft: That's fine. I won't make a big deal out of it@particularly.

group_1.textRight: But, but...

group_1.textLeft: Don't worry about it.@Just go, please.

group_1.textRight: ...Yuna, are you sure?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, it's no problem.
What's the matter?@You look unusually serious?

group_1.textRight: Hikaru's got something to talk about with Yuna.
